authors.email: christian DOT hagendorn AT 1und1 DOT de

shortdesc: The qooxdoo inspector is a tool designed to help debugging qooxdoo applications.  It consists of four seperate windows,  ...
description: The qooxdoo inspector is a tool designed to help debugging qooxdoo applications.  It consists of four seperate windows, (1) a javascript shell; (2) the object finder which shows a table of all qooxdoo objects; (3) the widget finder which shows a tree structure of the ui; (4) the property editor which shows all properties of the current selected object.

name: QxTransformer
shortdesc: QxTransformer is an open source framework providing conversion from a transparent XML description of the graphical user ...
description: QxTransformer is an open source framework providing conversion from a transparent XML description of the graphical user interface (GUI) to qooxdoo JavaScript code. It is designed to ease the burden of writing web application in JavaScript and allows automated creation of UI within the regular qooxdoo build and deployment process. The framework ships with an xml 'dialect' which mirrors the qooxdoo object structure, but allows to integrate any other xml semantics with an advanced templating system.

name: RpcJs
summary: Remote Procedure Call server and Transport Simulator, implemented entirely in JavaScript
shortdesc: This module supports a transport simulator, allowing requests to be issued by the client application to a 'server' runni...
description: This module supports a transport simulator, allowing requests to be issued by the client application to a 'server' running in the browser. This allows requests to be tested entirely in the browser -- client to server and back to client -- before having to build any real server code. If this JavaScript server is run at the real server as well, then the same code written for testing can be used at the real server.

name: TableColumnMenuGrid
summary: Alternative table column visibility menu, using a drag grid

authors.name: Derrell Lipman (derrell)
authors.email: derrell DOT lipman AT unwireduniverse DOT com

shortdesc: The Table widget's column visibility menu is not scrollable and becomes truncated if the table height is too small for a...
description: The Table widget's column visibility menu is not scrollable and becomes truncated if the table height is too small for all of the column names to be presented in the menu. This alternative column visibility menu presents the table column names is two columns of the menu: a column for the visible table column names, and a column for the hidden table column names. The names may be selected and dragged from one column to the other to affect column visiblity changes.
